data.eml:eml: A new species of Stasimopus from the Eastern Cape Province of South Africa (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Ctenizidae), with notes on its natural history

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hendrixson, Brent E., Bond, Jason E. (2004): A new species of Stasimopus from the Eastern Cape Province of South Africa (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Ctenizidae), with notes on its natural history. Zootaxa 619: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10101, URL: http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/2004f/zt00619.pdf
